description: Try our easy to follow Coconut Tuiles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Biscuit,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free
name: Coconut Tuiles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Combine desiccated coconut, icing sugar and plain flour in a bowl.

Add egg whites and melted unsalted butter. Drop teaspoonfuls onto the tray and spread to 7cm rounds. Bake for 5-7 minutes until pale golden around the edges. Lift off tray, lay over a rolling pan and leave to cool and shape.
